actionConfiguration.body: select max(`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`expdate`) AS `expdate`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`saka` AS `saka`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`pcode` AS `pcode`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`modelcode` AS `modelcode`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`modelname` AS `modelname`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`eng` AS `eng`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`pic` AS `pic`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`pH` AS `pH`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`use` AS `use`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`solvent` AS `solvent`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`properties` AS `properties`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`method` AS `method`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`use_p` AS `use_p`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`for` AS `for`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`cost_u` AS `cost_u`,`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`cost` AS `cost`,sum(`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`sin`) AS `sin`,sum(`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`sout`) AS `sout`,sum(`maya_raw_stock1sum`.`total`) AS `total`,coalesce(sum(case when `maya_raw_stock1sum`.`saka` = 'พันท้าย' then `maya_raw_stock1sum`.`total` end),0) AS `sk1`,coalesce(sum(case when `maya_raw_stock1sum`.`saka` = 'พระราม2' then `maya_raw_stock1sum`.`total` end),0) AS `sk2`,coalesce(sum(case when `maya_raw_stock1sum`.`saka` = 'บางเลน17' then `maya_raw_stock1sum`.`total` end),0) AS `sk3` from `maya_raw_stock1sum` group by `maya_raw_stock1sum`.`pcode`
